page.title: 17Recreation in Littlehampton
page.content: In Littlehampton there are many things that you can do.One of the newest attractions to Littlehampton is to do with the leisure industry and is the new swimming pool complex located on the sea front.This recreational complex boasts a modern indoor swimming pool ,squash courts and fitness centre. Another area which is very popular is the amusement park on the sea front.It is to here where many of the holiday makers congregate on those wet summer days. The amusement park has many of the most up to date rides ,attractions and electronic games as well as the more traditional gambling machines. The coast or sea front provides the biggest recreational attraction with its long sandy beaches.Other rec. facilities include tennis, golf, sportys fields,boating lakes etc.
